"Everyone is gathered and it is the fest:
"The preparations for Easter have ended
and everyone from ARKS are now heading
towards the location! But, many resurrected
enemies have appeared at the vicinity of the
location numerous times! Although Huey
has offered to go and take them down,
just he alone will be tough, I think! Will you
go and help him out!?
*Target Falz Hunar of Lv.1 or higher
recommend [Wild Easter]"

"イースターの準備も終わって
アークスのみんなも会場へ向かってるよ！
なのに、会場の近くで何度も復活する
エネミーがたくさん出てきたんだって！
ヒューイさんが倒しに行ってくれたんだけど
一人じゃ大変だと思うの！
お手伝いに行ってあげてくれないかなっ！

※Lv.1～のファルス・ヒューナルが対象
『ワイルドイースター』推奨"
